21Shares Amps Up Polkadot ETF Filing: Signals Growing Crypto Infra Play  Fresh buzz in the ETF world as 21Shares drops an amended S-1 on January 20, 2026, pushing for a Polkadot spot product. This isn't greenlight yet, but it shows real SEC chats heating up.  Filing highlights: - Proposed Nasdaq ticker, seed at 20k shares for 25 each - Super low 0.21 percent sponsor fee - Filed under GENIUS Act for smoother path - Eyeing 40-70 percent staking yield, likely phased in later  The shift here is massive: from debating if these ETFs work to fine-tuning how they deliver value like staking rewards. Polkadot's positioning as core infra gets a boost, drawing eyes to scalable chains.  This kind of institutional nod reminds me why TON is killing it!‚Ä®‚Ä®  Fast, cheap, and built for real adoption without the red tape drama. @ston_fi  takes that further with constant updates that make liquidity pools more efficient and user-friendly, letting users stake and trade seamlessly in ways that complement broader ecosystem upgrades. If you're into infra plays, TON via STONfi offers that accessible edge with frequent enhancements keeping it ahead.  Excited for more ETF waves? What's your angle?
